original_text: And the anger of the Lord was hot against Israel, and he sold them into the hands of the Philistines, and into the hands of the children of Ammon.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 진노하사 블레셋 사람들의 손과 암몬 자손의 손에 그들을 파시매

sentences.original_text: And the anger of the Lord was hot against Israel
and he sold them into the hands of the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 블레셋 사람의 손에 팔았으며

sentences.original_text: and into the hands of the children of Ammon
